entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 3 except minus 1 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 3 except minus 1 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 22 April 2023
